sections.content:
Question:
What kind of evaluation boards are prepared for RA0 series?
Answer:
The RA family offers the following three main types of evaluation environments
Evaluation Kit (EK): This is supported by rich on-board features for seamless evaluation.
Fast Prototyping Board (FPB): This is an inexpensive evaluation board specialized for prototype development of various applications.
Solution Kit: Solution kits for ASSP products. 
For the RA0 series, the Fast Prototyping Board (FPB) is provided, and for the RA0E1 group, it is FPB-RA0E1.
Suitable Products
RA0E1
